Did you succesfully start eclipse before installing your jre?
Could you run with eclipse and specify -clean on the command line?

(In reply to comment #1)
> Did you succesfully start eclipse before installing your jre?
No. I thought I have to install jre 1.4 before I unzip & start eclipse. I did not tried unzippping/starting eclipse before installation of Java 1.4.2_08
> Could you run with eclipse and specify -clean on the command line?
> 
I tried that It gave me the same error.

2. run eclipse file

Have you unzipped eclipse 3.1.2 over an install of eclipse 3.1?
It seems to me that you are missing some files. Could you try to re-extract the archive in another location and run again?

(In reply to comment #3)
> Have you unzipped eclipse 3.1.2 over an install of eclipse 3.1?
> It seems to me that you are missing some files. Could you try to re-extract the
> archive in another location and run again?
> 

This is the first time I am installing eclipse :-( Installing in another location I have already tried that. Same error.

What I am trying to do now is to download eclipse-sdk-3.2M6-solaris-motif.zip, then unzip & see if it works.

Let me know if you hv anyother suggestion for me.

Thanks
-Amal

Hi All,

After installation of eclipse-sdk-3.2M6-solaris-motif.zip, its working fine.

Thanks Pascal for the support.

Cheers
-Amal
